snippet: Jay-Z has long been in the inner circle of A-list athletes, and now he is making a move to turn those relationships into big business in a more formal way.
abstract: Hip-hop star Jay-Z is opening his own sports agency Roc Nation Sports; has long been in the inner circle of A-list athletes, and now he is making a move to turn those relationships into big business in a more formal way; is temporarily licensed to represent professional baseball players, luring New York Yankees second baseman Robinson Cano away from super agent Scott Boras.

byline.contributor: Michael Cieply, Ben Sisario, Brooks Barnes and David Waldstein contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Jay-Z has long been in the inner circle of A-list athletes, and now he is making a move to turn those relationships into big business in a more formal way.

headline.main: With New Move, Jay-Z Enters a Sports Agent State of Mind
headline.print_headline: With New Move, Jay-Z Enters A Sports Agent State of Mind
